short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Roach.ai: Boost dropshipping & e-commerce with advanced Shopify analysis & competitor insights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Roach.ai is an advanced Shopify store analysis and competitor intelligence tool designed to empower dropshipping and e-commerce businesses. It offers a comprehensive suite of features to help you gain valuable insights into your competitors' stores and their best-selling products, enabling you to refine your business strategy and product offerings. Here's how to use Roach.ai:

Getting Started with Roach.ai:
When you visit any Shopify website, Roach.ai seamlessly integrates at the bottom of the page, allowing you to initiate analysis without needing to navigate to the top right corner of your browser.

Key Features of Roach.ai:
üîç In-Depth Store Insights:
Roach.ai helps you discover essential information about any store, including its name, theme, creation date, first and newest product launches, location details, language, currency, product count, and more.

üìà Sales Tracking and Analytics:
Access real-time sales tracking for Shopify stores with insights into sales time, sold products, generated revenue, order per hour, revenue per hour, and more. Easily export and download sales and raw data for analysis.

üõç Product Analysis and Research:
Uncover top-performing products, newly added items, and product statistics. You can export both product data and images using our free tool, ensuring seamless integration with your import format.

üîé Advanced Theme and App Detection:
Our powerful Shopify theme and app detector boasts a vast collection of app rules. It allows you to identify all installed Shopify apps in Our system.

üì¢ Traffic Source and Ad Platform Insights:
Discover the traffic sources and ad platforms utilized by stores, including Meta (Facebook) Ads, TikTok Ads, Pinterest Ads.

üìö Product Review Management:
Download product reviews from popular review apps such as Loox, Judge.me, Product reviews, and more. Export and download review content, and easily upload it to your own store.

üöÄ Niche Research and Trend Identification:
Leverage Roach.ai's Niche Scraper to uncover winning products ideal for your dropshipping business. Our tool is your ultimate product research companion.

üìä Store Data Analysis:
Roach.ai provides detailed store information, product breakdown by type, vendor, and tags, and time distribution of the latest product launches.

Connect with Roach.ai:
For any inquiries or support, reach out to us via email at service@roach.ai. To learn more about Roach.ai and its functionalities, visit our official website at www.roach.ai.

At Roach.ai, we're committed to helping you excel in your e-commerce journey with advanced tools that are 10X better. Experience the future of Shopify store analysis and competitor insights today.
